description: The Agricultural Extension scheme under the Sub-Mission on Agricultural Extension (SMAE) aims to empower farmers through training, demonstrations, and dissemination of advanced agricultural technologies.
key_features: Support through Agricultural Technology Management Agency (ATMA)

benefits.productivity_improvement: Increased crop yields through technology adoption

criteria: Priority to small and marginal farmers

steps: Contact local ATMA office or Krishi Vigyan Kendra
Register for training programs or demonstrations

special_notes: Focus on women farmers and youth
